Judul: ANALYSIS OF PUBLIC INTEREST ON IMMUNOMODULATOR HERBAL DRUGS DURING COVID-19 PANDEMIC IN INDONESIA USING GOOGLE TRENDS
Abstrak:
COVID-19 Pandemic has been spreading across the world which is known to be caused by the new
strain of coronavirus, namely SARS-CoV-2. Herbal drug is one of the alternative medicines that is
commonly used by people in Indonesia to treat and prevent COVID-19. Immune system plays a
huge role in the elimination of viral infection, thus, a lot of people seeking a treatment that can
enhance their immune system such as immunomodulator. This study aimed to help identifying
the trends among herbal drugs endorsed by the Ministry of Health as COVID-19 preventive or
additional treatment. The research was done using the secondary data collected from Google
Trends in the form of Relative Search Volume (RSV). The RSV for each search topics were tested
against the weekly confirmed case of COVID-??ð???¸??±?ð  ­??± ?? ???®???±? ?ð???±?????
addition, 2 herbal drugs having the highest interest were compared with 2 conventional drugs
having the highest interest as a comparison. The research shown that there happened to be an
influence of COVID-19 looking by the statistically significant positive correlation between the
trends of some herbal drugs and the weekly confirmed case which are Piper betle (r= 0.356; Pvalue= 0.000), Zingiber officinale (r= 0.282; P-value= 0.004), and Orthosiphon aristatus (r= 0.196;
P-value= 0.045). The immunomodulator herbal drug having the highest interest is ginger (Zingiber
officinale). The interest of herbal drugs seems to be more stable than the interest of conventional
drug. The peak of search for both herbal drugs and conventional drugs happened around the
same time.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Tjokorde Istri Armina Padmasawitri, S.Si., M.Si., Ph.D.
Kata Kunci: COVID-19, herbal drugs, immunomodulator, Google Trends
